price: Sie sagten: Auf Allah verlassen wir uns. Unser Herr, mache uns nicht zu einer Versuchung für das ungerechte Volk,
arabic: فَقَالُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَا رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: faqālū ʿalā al-lahi tawakkalnā rabbanā lā tajʿalnā fit'natan lil'qawmi al-ẓālimīna
